review: Works really well most of the time, but seems to require A LOT of restarts. I love my Apple TV. I use it as a second monitor when I'm working at home with my Macbook Pro, and also to stream from my iMac, and watch Netflix and PBS. I'm taking one start off because there are  A LOT of times the AppleTV simply stops working and rebooting it always fixes the issues. This can be kind of a pain when you're halfway through watching something.
author: John S. Ruzicka "John R"
